title: Locally built GraalVM (with local built JDK) fails to build Quarkus Native with NPE
body:
### Describe the bug

Building Quarkus with a locally built GraalVM, which uses a locally built JDK fails with an NPE:

```[INFO] [io.quarkus.deployment.pkg.steps.JarResultBuildStep] Building native image source jar: /Users/g/1/mendrugo/quarkus-quick-crud/hibernate-orm-quickstart/target/hibernate-orm-quickstart-1.0.0-SNAPSHOT-native-image-source-jar/hibernate-orm-quickstart-1.0.0-SNAPSHOT-runner.jar
[INFO] [io.quarkus.deployment.pkg.steps.NativeImageBuildStep] Building native image from /Users/g/1/mendrugo/quarkus-quick-crud/hibernate-orm-quickstart/target/hibernate-orm-quickstart-1.0.0-SNAPSHOT-native-image-source-jar/hibernate-orm-quickstart-1.0.0-SNAPSHOT-runner.jar
[INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------
[INFO] BUILD FAILURE
[INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------
[INFO] Total time:  15.726 s
[INFO] Finished at: 2023-06-21T09:27:03+02:00
[INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------
[ERROR] Failed to execute goal io.quarkus:quarkus-maven-plugin:3.1.2.Final:build (default) on project hibernate-orm-quickstart: Failed to build quarkus application: io.quarkus.builder.BuildException: Build failure: Build failed due to errors
[ERROR] 	[error]: Build step io.quarkus.deployment.pkg.steps.NativeImageBuildStep#build threw an exception: java.lang.RuntimeException: Failed to get GraalVM version
[ERROR] 	at io.quarkus.deployment.pkg.steps.NativeImageBuildRunner.getGraalVMVersion(NativeImageBuildRunner.java:40)
[ERROR] 	at io.quarkus.deployment.pkg.steps.NativeImageBuildStep.build(NativeImageBuildStep.java:218)
[ERROR] 	at java.base/jdk.internal.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke0(Native Method)
[ERROR] 	at java.base/jdk.internal.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(NativeMethodAccessorImpl.java:77)
[ERROR] 	at java.base/jdk.internal.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.java:43)
[ERROR] 	at java.base/java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Method.java:568)
[ERROR] 	at io.quarkus.deployment.ExtensionLoader$3.execute(ExtensionLoader.java:909)
[ERROR] 	at io.quarkus.builder.BuildContext.run(BuildContext.java:282)
[ERROR] 	at org.jboss.threads.ContextHandler$1.runWith(ContextHandler.java:18)
[ERROR] 	at org.jboss.threads.EnhancedQueueExecutor$Task.run(EnhancedQueueExecutor.java:2513)
[ERROR] 	at org.jboss.threads.EnhancedQueueExecutor$ThreadBody.run(EnhancedQueueExecutor.java:1538)
[ERROR] 	at java.base/java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:833)
[ERROR] 	at org.jboss.threads.JBossThread.run(JBossThread.java:501)
[ERROR] Caused by: java.lang.NullPointerException
[ERROR] 	at java.base/java.util.Objects.requireNonNull(Objects.java:209)
[ERROR] 	at org.graalvm.home.Version.parse(Version.java:260)
[ERROR] 	at io.quarkus.deployment.pkg.steps.GraalVM$Version.<init>(GraalVM.java:156)
[ERROR] 	at io.quarkus.deployment.pkg.steps.GraalVM$VersionParseHelper.parse(GraalVM.java:72)
[ERROR] 	at io.quarkus.deployment.pkg.steps.GraalVM$Version.of(GraalVM.java:207)
[ERROR] 	at io.quarkus.deployment.pkg.steps.NativeImageBuildRunner.getGraalVMVersion(NativeImageBuildRunner.java:37)
[ERROR] 	... 12 more
[ERROR] -> [Help 1]
[ERROR]
[ERROR] To see the full stack trace of the errors, re-run Maven with the -e switch.
[ERROR] Re-run Maven using the -X switch to enable full debug logging.
[ERROR]
[ERROR] For more information about the errors and possible solutions, please read the following articles:
[ERROR] [Help 1] http://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/MAVEN/MojoExecutionException
make: *** [../make/common/QuarkusProd.gmk:2: hibernate-orm-quickstart/target/hibernate-orm-quickstart-1.0.0-SNAPSHOT-runner] Error 1
```

The `native-image` version prints:

```
‚ùØ ~/opt/graalvm-17/bin/native-image --version
native-image 17.0.9-internal 2023-10-17
OpenJDK Runtime Environment GraalVM CE 17.0.9-dev.internal+0.1 (build 17.0.9-internal+0-adhoc.g.jdk17u-dev)
OpenJDK 64-Bit Server VM GraalVM CE 17.0.9-dev.internal+0.1 (build 17.0.9-internal+0-adhoc.g.jdk17u-dev, mixed mode, sharing)
```

### Expected behavior

_No response_

_No response_
